definitions.definition: Part of the hindbrain in vertebrates . In humans it lies between the brainstem and the back of the cerebrum and is formed of two lateral lobes and a median lobe. It plays an important role in sensory perception , motor output, balance and posture .

main_definition: ( neuroanatomy ) Part of the hindbrain in vertebrates . In humans it lies between the brainstem and the back of the cerebrum and is formed of two lateral lobes and a median lobe. It plays an important role in sensory perception , motor output, balance and posture .
